committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water, Power and Offshore Energy Resources

official_title: To define "rural" for purposes of providing for subsistence uses pursuant to Title VIII of the Alaska National Interests Lands Conservation Act of 1980.
short_title: Rural Amendment to the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act

summary.text: Rural Amendment to the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act - Amends the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act of 1980 to define "rural" for purposes of providing for subsistence uses by rural Alaska residents of wild, renewable resources as a community or area of Alaska in which the noncommercial, customary, and traditional use of fish or game for personal or family consumption is a principal characteristic of the economy of the community or area.

titles.title: Rural Amendment to the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act
To define "rural" for purposes of providing for subsistence uses pursuant to Title VIII of the Alaska National Interests Lands Conservation Act of 1980.
